text: hi i'm vanessa from speak english with
vanessa calm what are you thankful for
let's talk about it it's Thanksgiving
time here in the US and this is a time
that we think about things that we're
thankful for my family has a
Thanksgiving tradition where we all sit
around the table on Thanksgiving night
and each person says something that
they're thankful for maybe something
that happened recently usually something
that happened in the last year something
good that happened or maybe a new friend
that they made something that they're
proud of and happy about that happened
and we say things that we are thankful
for this is an expression that I want to
share with you today thankful for
something that you are thankful for I'm
thankful for you you're learning English
with me and I really appreciate it
I spend a lot of time and effort to make

I'm really thankful that the things that

English expressions in the course I told
a story about when I was a child I had
to write an essay about things that I
was thankful for this is a typical
elementary school project where kids
have to write usually a list of things
that they're thankful for and guess what
I wrote one of the things that I was
thankful for was the garbage man the
garbage man is the guy who comes to your
house and picks up your garbage or he
takes your garbage bin and empties it
into the garbage truck I wrote
as a six year old or seven year old I
wrote I'm thankful for the garbage man
and when my parents read my essay
they asked me Vanessa why are you
thankful for the garbageman
most people say I'm thankful for my mom
I am thankful for my teacher well I said
I'm thankful for the garbage man because
if we didn't have a garbage man who
would take care of our trash everywhere
would stink such a practical little mind
well this was something that I was
